001package src.pkg_commands;
002import src.pkg_models.Player;
003import src.pkg_game.GameEngine;
004
005
006/**
007 * ChargeCommand class represents a command that allows the player to charge their beamer.
008 * The player can charge the beamer by specifying its name.
009 * 
010 * @author Pierre MATAR
011 */
012public class ChargeCommand extends Command
013{
014     /**
015     * Executes the ChargeCommand, allowing the player to charge the beamer in their current room.
016     * 
017     * @param pPlayer The player who issued the command.
018     * @param pGameEngine The game engine which contains the state of the game.
019     */
020    
021    @Override
022    public void execute(final Player pPlayer, final GameEngine pGameEngine ) {
023        if (!super.hasSecondWord()) {
024            pGameEngine.getGui().println("charge what ?");
025            return;
026        }
027        String vBeamerName = super.getSecondWord();
028        if (!vBeamerName.equals(pPlayer.getBeamer().getName())) pGameEngine.getGui().println(vBeamerName + " is not the beamer");
029        else if (pPlayer.getItem(pPlayer.getBeamer().getName()) == null) pGameEngine.getGui().println("You don't own the beamer");
030        else {
031            pPlayer.setBeamerRoom(pPlayer.getCurrentRoom());
032            pGameEngine.getGui().println("You charged the beamer");
033        }
034        
035    }
036}
